messages.subject: Web site update
messages.msgSnippet: Just to let you guys know I added some stuff to the website including fact sheets on Saitou and Nagakura including the cool Grandpa Nagakura faces off Against
messages.messageBody:
Just to let you guys know I added some stuff to the website including
fact sheets on Saitou and Nagakura including the cool Grandpa Nagakura
faces off Against the Yakuza Guys tale that Serizawa told us. (That is
_so_ how I picture the old wolves of Mibu when they were older) and also
a bunch of screencaps and Shinsengumi Keppuroku commentary by Masayoshi


--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
